resources.string:
This series of applications first started off with a Windows CLI app which then turned into this app and a Windows desktop application and was created because I found it irritating that you had to pay for software in order to see for example battery temperature.


Now what I mean by "pay" is for example if you wanted to change the color of a widget which displayed information in a ugly neon-green color, you would have to pay $5 USD and that is $5 USD too much for me. I have also created this just for the fun of it and I hope you enjoy using this app more than I enjoyed building it!


324Hz


win21H2
